title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Escape Alien Abduction
content:
Trick-or-treaters, beware! The UFOs above the city’s skyline are seizing unsuspecting citizens and dropping them in a dark, locked basement under Fort Zancudo with up to three other unfortunate souls.

Successfully escaping alien clutches in the UFO Abduction will reward you with The Shocker — a less-than-lethal device to incapacitate targets without risk of mortal injury. Plus, earn GTA$ and RP for your efforts, alongside returning Green and White UFO Boxer Shorts for being abducted.
